transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Good morning. Shivam baat kar raha hun India Mart se. Catalog mein aapne
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Haan mam mujhse pehle baat hui thi ek baar to maine aapko bataya tha aapke kuch catalog me kuch changes nahi kiye the right?
Customer: Hmm. Haan.
Executive: Mam uske baad mera activity bhi dekho India Mart mein main daily call kar raha hun. Theek hai? Lekin wo sab aap bol rahe aluminium track chahiye wo hamara product nahi hai sir.
Customer: Achcha. But mam main dekh raha hun ki aap main aapka chart dekh ke hi aapko call kiya hai and mam main dekh raha hun ki aapne November ki aaj tarikh hai aaj date hai 18 theek hai? 18 din ho chuke hai mam aapne 18 din mein keval do din aapne India Mart use kiya hai dekhiye aapne keval char buylead use kiye the keval char buylead aapne consume kiye aapne to kafi kam hai.
Customer: Dusra dusra lead the na wo hamare product available hi nahi hai sir.
Executive: Mam dekhiye main bol diya kyuki wo wo hamare products ka nahi hai.
Customer: Achcha matlab jo leads a rahi hai wo aapke relevant nahi hai.
Customer: Bhaiya India Mart mein itna healthy nahi ho raha hai is time. Maine last time kitne logo se baat kiya tha ki sir ye sab product hai faltu mein mujhe dusre dusre aa rahe hai.
Executive: But mam mam se baat ki thi mam ki puri mapping check ki thi. Jo inke product the maine wo check kiye the sare. And usme kuch changes bhi kiye the maine.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Haan. Kuch nahi hua bol rahe the.
Executive: Sir kuch new keywords bhi aaye hai basically jo aapke buyers use kar rahe hai. Theek hai? Jo aapke buyers use kar rahe hai kuch keywords par wo keyword aapke catalog mein add nahi hai. Main kuch naam bolta hun keywords mujhe batana aap. Pehla aapka sliding handle.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Fir aapka UPVC door handle fir aapka but but him sir. UPVC door locks window latches adjustable sliding roller friction him aluminium window handle weather weather seal strip weather seal strip fir aapka aluminium window fitting. Uski problem nahi hai product sahi dikha rahe hai but problem hai leads ki leads kahi aur
Executive: Ji sir meri baatein suniye ek baar ye jo main aapko bol raha hun na ye buyers search kar rahe hai lekin ye specific keywords aapke catalog mein add nahi hai.
Customer: Achcha catalog mein add nahi hai isliye puch raha hun.
Executive: Haan ye specific ye wale keywords jo buyer search kare aapke catalog mein add nahi hai iske liye main call kiya aapko ki isko add karwa lijiye to ek kaam kijiye aap 10 minute ke liye video meet join kijiye main aapko add karwata hun abhi theek hai main aapke sare specification sab main add kar dunga on video call theek hai video meet mein.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Main aapko link share karta hun abhi us video meet ko join kijiye theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai sir. Video call pe
Executive: Ek minute rukiye. Video meet mein main aapko link bhej raha hun gmail id par call par rahiye main aapko link share karta hun.
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: Achcha join kijiye sir desktop pe better rahega ki aap desktop use kijiye.
Executive: Sir maine aapko link share kiya ek baar check kijiye.
Customer: Link aapne share kiya hai matlab mail pe kiya hai ki
Executive: Haan ji mail pe mail pe aapke.
Customer: Theek hai sir.
Customer: Rajiv 9 gmail.com hai sir.
Executive: Haan sir main dekh raha hun. Sir wo mere dusre laptop par register hai ek second na main dekh raha hun.
Customer: Haan check kijiye.
Executive: Achcha try kijiye ki join kare aap desktop se to aapko jyada jyada better samajh mein aayega.
Customer: Shivam karke aaya hai Shivam. Haan Shivam Verma.
Customer: Haan sir main join kar raha hun theek hai main is call ko cut karu?
Executive: Nahi nahi join kis se kijiyega phone se ya desktop se?
Customer: Wo mobile pe hai wo wala.
Executive: Nahi desktop se join kar payenge abhi aap? Mere pass laptop ka access nahi hai filhal.
Customer: Achcha theek hai to aap ek kaam kijiye aap join kar lijiye mobile pe hi lekin abhi join kijiyega 30 second baad uska aapka link generate ho raha hai abhi 30 second baad join kijiyega.
Customer: Abhi main join karu mujhe dikh raha hai Shivam what my call.
Executive: Haan theek hai join kijiye.
Customer: Haan sir main join to kiya hai.
Executive: Theek hai aapko meri aawaz aa rahi hai?
Customer: Haan sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer says IndiaMART is not healthy.

- Customer receiving irrelevant buyleads.

- Customer says leads are not available in product.



Resolution:

- Executive checked customer's mapping and products.

- Executive shared new keywords to add to catalog.

- Executive offered to add specifications on video call.



Next Steps: 

- Executive shared video meet link to customer.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, keywords, video call
